website_summaries.verdict: A classic with a subtle yet significant style upgrade, the Puma Basket Classic Textured is a pair that displays excellent attention to detail. The shoe retains its streamlined silhouette and sophisticated leather upper but now comes with a reptile-like texture on its sides that exude luxury.Let this sneaker add sophistication and class to your casual footwear collection and your everyday look. Moreover, it offers the familiar fit and time-tested comfort of its range at a wallet-friendly price.
pros: Majority of the shoe users agreed that the Puma Basket Classic Textured is a comfortable pair
It is available in a number of tonal colorways
Some reviewers were delighted that the shoe's material is easy to clean
Most of the purchasers find that the Puma Basket Classic Textured to be sleek and stylish
A few of the consumers said that the shoe's craftsmanship and materials are of excellent quality
A number of wearers loved the textured details on the shoe's medial and lateral sides up to its heel, as it adds a distinct look to its overall design
The Puma Basket Classic Textured is available at an affordable price
cons: Some consumers disclosed that the pair could run narrower than standard sizes

customer_reviews.title: Overall excellent, but tight width and *not* a neutral grey
customer_reviews.text: More precisely, I'd give these 4.5 stars. I ding them a half star because they are definitely narrow. My feet aren't wide; they're normal. But these are tight in the width. Otherwise, as with all of these types of shoes, just know that they have very little support or cushion. I can wear them all day, but they'd be a problem for some people. Apart from fit, I love the style and texture, and they're very well constructed. One thing to know, for those people with a good eye for color... these are NOT a neutral grey; they have a greenish hue to them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Classic Pumas
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved the classic Puma design and i was very glad to have picked up a pair for so cheap. They don't fit like my vans and i guess maybe that's why they're a little uncomfortable, I've been wearing vans everyday for like 2 months but once i break these in more they should be 5 star worthy. They're a little big by the toes but nothing that will make you look like a duck.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Casanova

customer_reviews.title: I like the look
customer_reviews.text: I like the look. They're a little tight to start but will stretch a little as I wear and work them in. Great price, great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Vatios

customer_reviews.title: Sneakers are comfortable but the front wrinkled.
customer_reviews.text: Sneakers are comfortable but the front wrinkled. I am a very neat person and like my sneakers neat. The front toe part of the sneaker got wrinkles in it after the first time I wore them.
customer_reviews.author: Trinette Koonce

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very Comfortable, good quality in and out. Even though I have quite a few number of sneakers, I wear this more than I thought I would.
customer_reviews.author: Widman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product was to my liking, not having any inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for in a casual, decent looking and comfortable shoe. I'd buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My previous shoes were the classic suede Pumas. These new ones fit perfectly and are durable/well-made. They also look great. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: I used the Amazon size chart/estimator and it turned out perfectly. Shoes are a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Del Toro

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe and great price.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected, great clean, durable and comfortable shoes. I will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Giboney74

customer_reviews.title: Buying shoe online is a mistake. You cannot try ...
customer_reviews.text: Buying shoe online is a mistake. You cannot try out and take risk of the wrong size. Each manafucturer size is different.
customer_reviews.author: TheAmateur

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting Puma
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I still have the article and using.
customer_reviews.author: Maximo martell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sneakers aer really comfortable n r more stylish in person than on the screen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fireeeeeeeee
customer_reviews.text: Love it about to buy a different color in it
customer_reviews.author: troy.a.v

customer_reviews.title: TOO BIG
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is nice looking and seems comfortable. Unfortunately, I bought a size 8 and it iturned out to be extremely big. It must be around a 10. I presume this was a factory mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Yellow stains and  signs of being worn
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size 12 cuz the 13 I ordered was too big ... when I open the box I see scuffs and slight yellow stains on the shoes as if this shoe was worn before ... soo not pleased with this product !!!!
customer_reviews.author: edroy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Look, But They Don't Last Long
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfortable and stylish. Unfortunately the edges have started to come apart and fray after regular wear for about 2 months. Considering I bought them for only about $30, I would still say they were a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe
customer_reviews.text: True to size, but a snug fit. I normally wear an EE shoe, but can sometimes get away wearing normal shoes. The leather could have stretched out, but the reason I returned them was because of Amazon. After I purchased these shoes, they dropped in price. I called amazon to see if they would refund the difference since I had not yet received the shoes. Not a chance they told me. I tried to give these shoes a shot, but wasn't worth the trying after what they told me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable kicks that keep it real
customer_reviews.text: Pumas always feel a little small at first, since I'm really a half size up but going a full size is too roomy. Then the leather stretches after a couple of walks and all's good. The textured design on these court shoes make them stand apart from the uniquitous black shoes with white soles that have become standard issue for any guy with a modicum of fashion sense these days. Dresses down corporate attire and keeps your internet-guy-blazer-with-vneck-tshirt look real.
customer_reviews.author: Rainier Castro

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: What a joke! Of course the shoe I selected only be available through a 3rd party and cost nearly $100. Thanks Amazon prime
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jcb

product_meta.title: Puma Mens Basket Classic Textured-M Basket Classic Textured
product_meta.description: Originate from the PUMA archive back in 1971, this was the leather answer to the suede. It's singular but yet clean and simple design propelled this shoe into the sneaker Hall of Fame. Featuring some embossed overlays on the upper in order to create this textured pack.
feature_bullets: Low-top sneaker featuring tonal reptile-embossed side panels and soft knit collar
Foil logos at side and heel insert
